title: Lightning: Saga of the Savage
description: Alea is struggling. Her father died the Christmas she was five. Now at fifteen she's losing her relationship with her twin, Belle, her elder sister and mom have been deported and high school may just be the end of her.When an accident gives her the ability to run faster than the speed of sound she must manage to keep her self upright or else those she loves will perish.Could it be that the secret to victory is to awaken the dark side of her? Is she fast enough to outrun her biggest enemy? Herself?
author: ISM Stephensbailey
